title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.20 - Stewards determine extent of disqualification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4039.20 - Stewards determine extent of disqualification

State Regulations

The stewards are vested with the power to determine
the extent of disqualification in case of fouls. The stewards may place the
offending horse behind such horses as, in the stewards' judgment, the offending
horse interfered with, or the stewards may place the offending horse last, and
the stewards may disqualify the offending horse from participation in any part
of the purse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4039.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
